summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Workforce, Education, and Equity Committee of the City of Dallas was scheduled to hold a meeting on November 13, 2023, at 9:00 AM in the Council Chambers at City Hall. The general purpose of the committee is to address issues related to workforce development, educational initiatives, and equity within the community.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
The meeting was intended to cover various topics pertinent to workforce and education strategies; however, it has been cancelled. The next meeting is planned for December 11, 2023.

**Important Details**:  
No specific proposals, budget items, policy changes, or projects were discussed due to the cancellation of this meeting. The agenda for the upcoming meeting in December has not been detailed in this notice.

**Action Items**:  
Since the meeting was cancelled, no decisions or approvals are being sought at this time. The committee will reconvene at the next scheduled meeting on December 11, 2023, where future actions may be determined. 

This summary captures the essential information regarding the cancelled meeting and the scheduling of the next committee session.
